description:
Travel back in time to the Stone Age!

Immerse yourself in an exciting world of ancient adventures and dangers. Fight cavemen, sharks, spiders, spiny turtles and many other monsters. Only the right strategy will help you defeat all your enemies in this game!

Game Features:
- Fascinating gameplay reminiscent of classic retro games.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Mesmerizing sound effects and music.
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Artificial intelligence of monsters.
- Ability to destroy bricks, blocks and moving platforms.
- 3 exciting worlds with the promise of big updates.
- Swim, jump, run, ride a dinosaur and fight powerful bosses!

Your adventure begins today!
name: Super Prehistoric World Adventure
intro: Journey to the Stone Age. Fight dangerous enemies and bosses using strategy. Destroy barriers, explore worlds.
